select * from indent o,custom c where o.cid=c.cid
AND ( o.oid LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.customname like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.wwid like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.netid like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') )
order by o.createtime DESC
SELECT * from indent o,user u ,custom c WHERE o.creater=u.id and o.cid=c.cid and o.oid=#{oid}
select b.businessname,f.flowname,w.price,w.workcom,i.info from business b, flow f,work w left join info i on w.wid = i.wid where b.bid = w.bid and f.fid = w.fid and w.oid=#{oid}
SELECT oid from indent WHERE createtime BETWEEN #{bdate} and #{edate}

select * from indent o ,custom c,`work` w left join info i on w.wid = i.wid where o.oid = w.oid and o.cid = c.cid
and ( i.info like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or o.oid LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or o.used LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.customname like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.wwid like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.tbcode like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.tbname like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR c.netid like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') )
order by i.wid DESC
